channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: King Ultramega Supergroup Pays Tribute to Chris Cornell With ‘Rusty Cage’ Cover
item.description: 🎸 Rock legends unite to honor the great Chris Cornell with a killer 'Rusty Cage' cover! 🤘 #musicnews #ChrisCornellTribute

item.title: Travis Scott’s ‘Jackboys 2’ Tops Albums Chart
item.description: 🔥 Travis Scott does it again! ‘Jackboys 2’ takes the top spot on the albums chart. Let's keep those vibes going! 🎶 #TravisScott #Jackboys2

item.title: My Chemical Romance Bring “Black Parade” Tour to San Francisco: Photo Gallery
item.description: 🖤✨ My Chemical Romance taking San Francisco by storm with their iconic "Black Parade" tour! 🎶 Check out the epic photo gallery now! #MCR #BlackParadeTour

item.title: Watch Dirt Buyer Cover Goo Goo Dolls’ “Iris”
item.description: 🎶 Dirt Buyer puts a fresh spin on the classic "Iris" by Goo Goo Dolls! Check out their rockin' rendition now! 🤘 #MusicCover #DirtBuyer #GooGooDolls

item.title: Billie Eilish Teams With James Cameron For 3-D Concert Film
item.description: Billie Eilish takes us to another dimension with a 3-D concert film collab with James Cameron! 🌟🚀 #BillieEilish #JamesCameron #MusicNews
